Translations.Text: S leufuf d tirni
S tid i t inehoen, nehoent
S tid iqqaoen asmekti
Oebbi nnwen, s tidep, ard Yiwen
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, Mass n yigmav
Ih, Ncebbee igenni aqoib mavi, s ccbaea n yitran
i ueareb si yal cciian amnafeq
ur ssemeasen i le$wat aalayen nezzeh; ad pwaoeomen, si yal tama
ad pwanfun; fellasen aaaqeb idumen
Ma illa win iccleqfen ayen iccelqef, a t id ivfeo usafu ifellun
Steqsi ten: day nitni, axlaq nnsen, iwaao sennig win n wiyav, i Nexleq? Ni$ Nexleq iten s talaxt ibbeliuveen
Xaii, twehmev, la ttihin
Ma pwafekkoen d, ur d smektayen
Ma walan assekni, ad mmaalken
Nnan: "wagi, ih, iban kan d sseur
Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, d i$san, day a d nu$al
akked lejdud nne$ imezwura
Ini: "ih, u a ppilim d imedlulen
Yiwet n ti$oi kan, d$a nitni pmuqulen
Nnan: "a ssexv nne$, wagi d ass uqeiii
Wagi d ass ueuddu, i$ef tellam d inekkaoen
Ssemlilet ed wid idensen, tilawin nnsen, akked wayen aabden
war OOebbi. Nehoet pen s abrid n wu$ud. ¨¨
Eiifet pen, ih, nitni fellasen asteqsi. E
